fullText: LuPone and Winger are both spectacular actresses, but they can't make David Mamet's sterile two-hander come alive.
dtliExcerpt: LuPone and Winger are both spectacular actresses, but they can't make David Mamet's sterile two-hander come alive.
bwwExcerpt: The entire 70-minute show consists of Cathyâ€™s parole-plea meeting, with the two women tossing arguments back and forth. Mamet is slow and stingy in dispensing details, maybe in an attempt to make the encounter a pure philosophical debate.
